0.	Install 7zip

1.	Install OpenCV by downloading a Windows build from http://opencv.org/downloads.html
	We used this build: https://github.com/opencv/opencv/releases/download/2.4.13/opencv-2.4.13.exe
	Extract the archive in the dependencies directory using 7zip

2.	Install FFmpeg by downloading Windows dev and shared builds from http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/dev/
	We used this build: http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/dev/ffmpeg-2.7-win64-dev.7z and http://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/shared/ffmpeg-2.7-win64-shared.7z
	Extract the archives in the dependencies directory using 7zip
